'FitTV' was an American digital cable and satellite channel, owned by Discovery
Communications. The channel focused on fitness and exercise-related programming.
FitTV offered programming with such fitness celebrities as Cathe Friedrich,
Sharon Mann, Gilad Janklowicz, Marilu Henner, Tamilee Webb and others. The
network's logo was also known for its alternating colors. On February 1, 2011,
it merged with Discovery Health Channel to become Discovery Fit & Health.
